description:
Shinmon Yayoi walks around every day with her camera in the hopes of getting a scoop on Twin Angel for the school’s newspaper club. When Haruka, Aoi and Kurumi try to put the brakes on this behavior, they all suddenly get caught up in a hostage situation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekisatsu Gekisha! Target wa Twin Angel
Sizzling Hot Photos! The Target is the Twin Angel!
激撮激写! 標的はツインエンジェル
